net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers

Class GenericDocValuesImageSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.AbstractImageSearcher
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.GenericDocValuesImageSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageSearcher

    public class GenericDocValuesImageSearcher
extends AbstractImageSearcher
    A generic image searcher for global features that uses DocValues instead of Lucene text fields. Please make sure you created the index using th useDocValues option in
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

        Searches for images similar to the given image, defined by the Document from the index.

        reader - the IndexReader which is used to dsearch through the images.
